manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ARM & HAMMER Essentials Solid Deodorant Beat tough odor with essential, natural ingredients. ARM & HAMMER Essentials Solid Deodorant combines the odor-fighting power of pure ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda with natural plant extracts. Free of aluminum, parabens, colorants, or animal-derived ingredients, it’s the natural way to keep you smelling clean. Stay naturally fresh with ARM & HAMMER Essentials Solid Deodorant.

Features & Benefits Powered by Baking Soda Trust the brand that’s been fighting tough odors for over 170 years: ARM & HAMMER. Natural Ingredients Stay fresh all day, naturally, without aluminum, parabens, colorants or animal-derived ingredients. Also available in Unscented. Stain Shield Get long-lasting odor protection without sacrificing your clothes. Essentials won't leave yellow underarm stains on your favorite shirt or blouse. 24-hour Protection Choose the antiperspirant that doesn’t quit. Get long-lasting, 24-hour protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elite Odor Neutralization; Clear Application
reviews.reviewText: Because Mom kept an open box of Arm & Hammer Baking Soda in the fridge to neutralize odors, I thought a baking soda deodorant might also neutralize (not just mask). And it's true: At least for my sensitive skin, Arm & Hammer deodorant is the most efficacious nature-derived, non-antiperspirant deodorant I've found.This is a clear stick that goes on clear -- no chalky white film residue on armpits or clothes, no wetness. Attractively, its label advertising, "Unscented - No Added Fragrance" is a touch inaccurate: While it's true it lists none of the "Fragrance" or "Parfum" that so often wreaks havoc on sensitive skin, it does have a mild, uplifting scent reflecting the fruit and flower oils noted in the ingredients.This one fights off stink and goes the distance. Great efficacy and a great value, particularly in this 4-pack offering. - (Was this review of use to you? If so, let me know by clicking "Helpful." Cheers!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s exactly like pictures show.
reviews.reviewText: So far I like this deodorant, especially since it doesn’t contain aluminum. So far it seems to control body odor in arm pits like it is supposed to. So far I am satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant works well and doesn’t leave you smelling like a high school student. Aluminum free and high quality. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's UNSCENTED - hugely important - and it works for my stinky kid.
reviews.reviewText: My kid likes it. It works, and it's a huge PITA to find locally. Now we don't need to look for a while. Good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product when you get past the "Unscented" scent
reviews.reviewText: As an avid bicyclist, I am quite used to sweating. I found my old deodorant/antiperspirant to be uncomfortable, obstructing sweating in my underarms and occasionally causing sweat glands to inflame.I also found that I needed to use the deodorant/antiperspirant consistently, and when I forgot or chose not to use it due to inflamed glands I would be quite pungent by the end of the day. There are recent studies showing that use of antiperspirant can actually increase pungency of sweat odor, and I certainly could be a case study.I don't subscribe to the idea that aluminum or parabens are bad for your health, and there's little evidence to back such a claim. I changed because I wanted to get away from using antiperspirant due to how it made me feel. This deodorant does not include antiperspirant, and my underarms feel better for it.Where I used to be pretty pungent 24 hours after application, use of the Arm & Hammer Essentials Deodorant has virtually eliminated underarm odor 24 hours later. Even better, I can go a day without deodorant and not be self-conscious that I'm leaving a trail of odor behind me.What I Really Like:- Underarms feel very clear, open, fresh. Underarms sweat as they should during exercise, and I don't have problems with inflamed sweat glands anymore.- Underarms feel clean after washing - no residue from antiperspirant.- Very little odor even 24 hours later, and very little odor after exercising.- Underarm odor is much more natural, much less pungent when it does appear.- Doesn't leave stains on clothes when it comes contact with them. I don't have to be nearly as careful to avoid letting my clothes hit my underarms getting dressed.I'd give it 5 stars except for these two things:- Despite being "unscented", this product smells like a combination Froot Loops cereal and Citronella candles. It's not at all offensive, but it's also not the scent you'd expect from a man. I'm not sure I'd prefer a more woody (Cedar or Sandlewood, perhaps) overtone, but the first few hours each morning makes me think of breakfast as a kid.- There's a tingling in the underarms for a couple hours after application. This is likely the alcohol slowly evaporating, but it can get a little itchy.I'm quite happy with this product, and will continue to get it - at least until someone offers a more "masculine" deodorant option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Reasonably-priced, works fine and has only a slight scent which is pleasant. What's not to love?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only deodorant that's ever worked for me
reviews.reviewText: I sweat a lot, and I have very sensitive skin. This is the only deodorant that's ever worked for me.At first it smells faintly like celery seed, but in a pleasant, nondistracting way (the old unscented formula smelled more like geranium, which was nicer but a little more pronounced). After a while, that hint of aroma fades, and by the end of the day, my pits smell like… nothing. Not like the acidic odor of sweat, not like some cloying artificial fragrance—just like the default scent of my body when it's reasonably clean. Someone could bury their face in your pits, if you're into that, and feel like they're smelling your natural scent, but you also wouldn't be reeking of pheromones like someone wearing no deodorant at all. It's also never caused any redness or irritation on my very sensitive skin, and it's cheaper than most drugstore deodorants.I don't write many product reviews, and I had to write one just to sing this deodorant's praises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars THEY CHANGED IT & IT NO LONGER WORKS
reviews.reviewText: This stuff used to have a faint citrusy scent to it (despite it being "unscented") and it worked great. Now suddenly I get a new delivery of it (a 4-pack, very unfortunately) and discover that it is now totally scentless -AND- most importantly doesn't work! Like at all. So I guess THAT was a waste of money and I'm now on the market for something else!
Me gusta que no irrita la piel y es potent3 contra la sudoracion excesiva

reviews.reviewTitle: Please find an EU dealer to sell these locally
reviews.reviewText: Thanks to Amazon, these were shipped from the UK to Germany.I am VERY SATISFIED.There isn't even a hint of bad odor (just sniffed), and it gives a gentle temperature gradient upon contact with the armpit.I'm a first-time satisfied user; after many years of searching for deodorants without aluminum salts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Best dermo sensitive deo there is…now in U.K.!
reviews.reviewText: I used to have a terrible reaction to most deodorants until, in a small grocery store in St Helena, Napa CA USA (Sunshine Foods — brilliant store and deli) I found Arm &Hammer Essentials “no probens, no aluminum” which “contains baking soda and natural plant extracts to absorb and fight odor”. For years I found it nowhere else and would stock up each time I visited the area. Then, on my last visit even that source dried up. Down to my last stick I wondered if Amazon had it and sure enough we are re-united.Anyone who has had underarm itchiness or tried totally ineffective alternatives, this is your answer. Get several. There is both unscented and scented; for total safety I go for the unscented.Really really great.
Una bomba, profumo fantastico e molto efficace.Lascia la pelle idratata, profumata per ore ed ore.
